resources.string: This is a companion app to BetterBatteryStats. It was copied to /system and stays there to grant permissions that can only be granted to system apps.\nThis app has no functionality at all. You may need to re-install BBS to get access to the app.
If the in-app uninstall fails please use this workaround
Uninstalled system app: your preferences have been reset. Please reboot to clean up and update your preferences.
